short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support adding products to KingCargoPH.com's cart

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ordering tools support Online import with millions of rich products from major Chinese E-Commerce websites such as:
- taobao.com
- tmall.com
- 1688.com

User manual:

1. Customers register for an account at https://id.KingCargoPH.com
2. Customers log in to their registered account at https://id.KingCargoPH.com/auth/login
3. Customer installs Extension
4. Customers access the product detail page on taobao.com, 1688.com, tmall.com, jd.com
5. Customers use the extension to add an order to their cart.
6. Customers access the cart at https://id.KingCargoPH.com/cart
7. Customers can deposit orders at the shopping cart.

For more information please visit KingCargoPH.com
